Title: New books
Publisher: Liaoning renmin chubanshe (辽宁人民出版社)
Notes: A scene in a library for comic books devoted to revolutionary models and martyrs: Huang Jiguang, Red Detachment of Women, Wang Jie, and others. The poster hanging on the back wall is "Charge the enemy to the last breath" (生命不息，冲锋不止), designed by the Fine Arts Section of the Chinese Revolutionary Army Museum (中国人民革命军事博物馆美术组), published in November 1970.
